title: Mistletoe Marriages: Rendezvous / The Wolf and the Lamb / Christmas in the Valley / Keeping Christmas
description: Rendevous by Elaine BarbieriTwo displaced Southerners come to realize that Christmas will never be right again until they are together forever.The Wolf and the Lamb by Kathleen EagleAs the Christmas season approaches, a spinster, her two stepdaughters and a MÃ©tis Indian scout discover they have become a family.Christmas in the Valley by Margaret MooreMarried to a Welsh miner, Kitty Maude doesn't realize what it means to be married until the Christmas she decides to leave home.Keeping Christmas by Patricia Gardner EvansAn itinerant seamstress brings the spirit of Christmas into the lives of a crusty rancher and two abandoned children.
author: Elaine Barbieri
